name: Project: Muse
description:
◆It was an incredible music game in a different way!
◆Every note，every voice is respond to your tap!

Game Features:
• Independent electronic music producer
• Lively electronic music
• Rhythm Gameplay
• Enjoy different style DEM
• Easy to play with unrivalled visual effect
• Different characters
• Compete with friends and global players


◆Best experience with headphones.

◆Hope you to enjoy the game!

◆【VIDEO FOR PHYLLIS】
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RW6etyNBOVw&feature=youtu.be

Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/RinzzGame


Disclaimer:
《Project: Muse》is a free game，but it involves optional VIP paid subscription service and some game props need to be paid for.
You can disable in-app purchases and turn off payments from the Settings menu.

Member Subscription:
◆ Subscribe to Project: Muse VIP，you can enjoy all of Membership exclusive rights.
◆ The subscription price is $4.99 per week.
◆During the subscription period, you can enjoy all the functions of members.
◆Subscriptions will be automatically renewed unless the automatic renewal is closed at least 24 hours before the current subscription expires.
◆Within 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period, the account will be deducted with renewal fees.
◆After purchase, you can go to the device settings to view account subscriptions and manage the services that have been enabled.
◆You can cancel subscriptions through iTune account subscriptions during the free trial period.Be sure to complete the subscription 24 hours before the end of the subscription to avoid being charged.
For more information please visit:https://support.apple.com/zh-cn/HT202039
◆You can turn off automatic renewals through your iTunes account Settings, but you cannot cancel the current subscription for a valid subscription period.
◆Any unused parts during the free trial period will be cancelled upon purchase of membership subscription.

Privacy policy:http://www.rinzz.com/privacy-policy/
